text:
@realDonaldTrump S Korea and US had 1st #COVID19 cases on same day.
SK launched massive testing. US still hasn’t

Not only has SK only lost 256 people vs US 77, 212  people but SK unemployment rate is only 4.8% vs US 14.7%

SK economy shrank 1.4% while US shrank 4.6%
#TrumpDepression
